extendedInfo.description: Get hold of this awesome android ball game that to for FREE !! Catch it if you can ...grab the free falling colorful balls from the sliding sticks by moving the bucketright below these swift balls and score points .The objective of this addictive game is to trap the slipping balls across the tilted sticks in the water bucket below by taping and movig the bucket .Try to snatchas many balls as you can. Each type of ball can add or deduct points from your score.Enjoy this simple yet exciting game now for free.How to play:â Concentrate on the balls sliding down from the bars .â Tap and move the bucket in both directions to catching various balls.â Catch buckets that increase your score only.â Catching the dangerous balls will deduct points.â Halloween ball will deduct 100 points ,planet ball gives you a bonus100 ,basket ball gives you 50 points ,chicken ball gives you 20 points andsmiley ball gives you 10 points.â Game will be over when the time is over .Features:-Beautiful backgrounds with nature theme that keeps changing.-It has three timer options to choose from- 1,3,5 mins respectively.-Settings for switching the sounds off or on as per your wish.-High scores are maintained .-Mesmerizing graphics and great sound effects are used which makes the game evenmore addictive.-Settings for turning sounds and vibration on/off.The game gives you various green backgrounds which depicts hills,flowers and gorgeous sun light falling on gardens. The bright colorful balls makes the graphicseven more attractive. Graet nature scenes .Must have game for all age groups !Isnât this game irresistible ? So why wait..get this cool game now !! Itâs a simple game yet a challenging game which tests your reflexes .The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V.It is also designed for Samsung Galaxy note andtablets. No internet connectivity is required to play this game.If you like our app, share it with your friends and family through facebook, twitter, googleplus.Stay tuned with us as very soon we will be releasing more fun android apps .Tags: bucket game, ball catching game, slipping ball game, crazy ball game
